pkgmetadata.longdescription: Exact (Restricted) Likelihood Ratio Tests for Mixed and Additive Models // Rapid, simulation-based exact (restricted) likelihood ratio tests for testing the presence of variance components/nonparametric terms for models fit with nlme::lme(),lme4::lmer(), lmeTest::lmer(), gamm4::gamm4(), mgcv::gamm() and SemiPar::spm().
